entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 25 except 21 near Lake Huron.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 25 except 21 near Lake Huron. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
